string.name: solution
string.br: As you can see, it is very easy to edit and recompile an app after editing a value as simple as a Boolean\n\n

In order to avoid this kind of weakness in your code :\n
- Activate Proguard
\n - Don\'t use variable names which are too explicits\n
- Multiply the checks (check a boolean in the data model, and also a hash linked to the user\'s transaction for example)\n
- If it\'s possible, manage all the premium features of your app on the server-side
